author: Fextralife
description:
Dark December Gameplay Preview - SHOULD You PLAY It? Is It Worth it? 
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be taking a look at Dark December, which is an upcoming RPG that serves as a prequel to Undecember, released back in 2022 by Korean developer Needs Games. Much like it's predecessor the game is promising a dark and deep action RPG, and whether you've played Undecember and are looking forward to the next title or are just on the lookout for a new uploading RPG, we've got you covered.

Pre-Register for the Game HERE: https://www.darkdecember.net/#register
Sponsored by: Needs Games
